name: Easy Web Backup
short_description: The most web administrators don't think about a backup of their homepage because it's to hard or they do not have time. With Easy Web Backup this will be much easier and your boring work has been done in a few minutes. It is the first free software which can be used to backup files and the MySQL database at the same time. No MySQL database is required but you need PHP support on your webserver. Note: I'm not responsible for your backups or security (even if your damage has happend through my software). I do not garantee that your backup will work. I always recommend to download only Stable releases. If you want to support me, please try a beta version and report bugs but you should not use it on your productive webpage. Ok? Than start today to backup your Website!
summary: Backup your full website. Secure. Easy. Fast.
